text: O manavulara! Vastavanga mi prabhuvu taraphu nundi, satyanni tisukoni mi vaddaku i sandesaharudu vacci vunnadu, kavuna atani mida visvasam kaligi undandi, ide miku melainadi. Mariyu miru ganaka tiraskariste! Niscayanga bhumyakasalalo unnadanta allah ke cendinadani telusukondi. Mariyu allah sarvajnudu, maha vivecana parudu
